text: Val-d'Auge is a commune in the department of Charente, southwestern France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Auge- Saint-Médard (the seat), Anville, Bonneville and Montigné.Arrêté préfectoral 29 November 2018 == See also == *Communes of the Charente department == References == Category:Communes of Charente
title: Val-d'Auge
